Q: How to make Vanilla Confetti Fantasy fudge at home.
O: (A) Bring mixture to a full boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly.  Remove from heat and stir in 12 ounce white chocolate chips until melted and thoroughly combined. Beat in 1 7 ounce jar of marshmallow creme, and 1/4 cup paper confetti .  Transfer fudge to Greased 8 x 13" pan and let cool before adding more sprinkles to the top and cutting into squares. (B) Bring mixture to a full boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly.  Remove from heat and stir in 12 ounce white chocolate chips until melted and thoroughly combined. Beat in 1 7 ounce jar of marshmallow creme, and 1/4 cup confetti Sprinkles.    Transfer fudge to Greased 8 x 13" pan and let cool before adding more sprinkles to the top and cutting into squares.
